item.title: Immigrant who allegedly dodged ICE with Wisconsin judge's help has been deported
item.description: An immigrant who was arrested after a Milwaukee judge allegedly helped him dodge federal agents has been deported.

item.title: Trump rolls back tariffs on grocery items, and critics say it's an admission tariffs raise prices
item.description: President Trump has signed an executive order to reduce tariffs on grocery items that have risen in price or cannot be grown easily in the U.S.
